summary_comment: Professor Kumar is highly regarded for her inspirational teaching style and comprehensive knowledge sharing. However, students must be prepared to actively participate in class discussions, as her engagement is more limited for those who do not contribute. She is less likely to offer extra points to students who remain passive during lectures.
summary_comment_short: Professor Kumar is highly regarded for her inspirational teaching and comprehensive knowledge sharing. However, students should be prepared to actively participate in class discussions, as this engagement influences her willingness to provide leniency during grading.

Ratings.comment: She was quite inspirational and I learned a lot. But be prepared to participate or she won't pay as much attention to you and won't be as willing to give back points come exam time
